channel.title: All the new people, mods check please
channel.description:
I have been noticing lately...Like 4-5 new people joined yesterday and today, within 36 hours. I'm just saying, check their IP addresses...This happened last time, when time2script joined and got 29 rep, and more new people started springing up to get more "rep". Then time2script and dudeofthed got banned, and so did time2script for making multiple accounts. So, just check their IP addresses, not to sound paranoid, but this is surely going to be a remake. Here's how it's going to go:
*Join*
Posts, friend reps, another friend reps, 3 more friends rep, now the newbie can rep people.
Newbie reps their other account 5 times, now that one can rep people. It continues!
I'm saying, personally, check their IP addresses, and, I don't mean to sound very drastic, but personally i'd support taking out rep points. If I had to choose, i'd base it on post count. Like user groups. Once you reach 1,000 posts or so, you get community member, or something
Because these random-repping newbies (no offence to the legit new people) are all gonna be Community Members. Community Members are people newbies look up to, and those corrupt CM's will be rule-breakers.
Didn't mean to blow it out of proportion, if that's how it seems. Lol sometimes I get carried away.
Post your thoughts, no flaming, i will not hesitate to report.

item.title: All the new people, mods check please
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:17, topic:118031”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=167333.msg1556096#msg1556096 date=1183151854]
You can only rep the same person once a week, or 168 hours.
[/quote]

Or 604800 seconds[/quote]

Lol, Nerd

Read full topic

item.title: All the new people, mods check please
item.dc:creator: @Tribal Tribal
item.description:
@Tribal wrote:

[quote=“h4xx0rz, post:3, topic:118031”]I know casey, just giving them a heads up. Because my one friend on here got away with it, now we’re not friends anymore >.<

[ontopic] mods please check new ip addresses… I know this is gonna happen again [/ontopic][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2007, 09:17:12 AM[/size][hr]OMG dude I don’t mean to double post, but a new person JUST joined and made a new post in here…This is REALLY weird, you all gotta agree…theres like 6 of them now[/quote]
Your friend got away with it and now you’re not his friend anymore?
What kind of a friend are you anyway??
Its just a forum its nothing that should change your social life.

Some people are taking some things too serious…

Read full topic

item.title: All the new people, mods check please
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It doesn’t matter anyway. You can only rep one person every week I believe and you have to have over 15 rep to do so. No matter how many accounts they make, they

  1. Have to get past the quiz

and

  1. Have to have over 15 rep just to give 1 rep every week to the same person

Read full topic

item.title: All the new people, mods check please

item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote]re-read the T.O.S, of course you were! AND I have a SNEAKING SUSPICION that you have more than 1 account, and i already made a thread warning all

So you pmed this to aj?
Well then, Aj, Tr3v0r, and myself all live in the same neighborhood, he does not have multiple accounts(or so I believe) and he still has 10 rep, both myself and tr3v0r can ++, but we have not.[/quote]

Yah have a mod check our ip’s? They wil be different.
